mapper.select: SELECT * FROM restaurants WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId} AND is_active = true ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM restaurants WHERE is_active = true ORDER BY rating DESC, review_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM restaurants WHERE id = #{id} AND is_active = true
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurants (owner_id, name, category, location, address, jibun_address, phone, hours, description, image, parking, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{ownerId}, #{name}, #{category}, #{location}, #{address}, #{jibunAddress}, #{phone}, #{hours}, #{description}, #{image}, #{parking}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE restaurants SET is_active = false, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
